document: ASSESSMENT OF COAL LIQUEFACTION BEHAVIOR THROUGH PRODUCT CHARACTERIZATION WITH HYPHENATED CHROMATOGRAPHIC/SPECTROSCOPIC METHODS by John William Hellgeth Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Chemistry APPROVED: L. T. Taylor, Chairman J. G. Mason J. P. Wightman G. L. Long D. G. I. Kingston December 1986 Blacksburg, Virginia
